Package net.metarelate.terminology.exceptions

Exception used in the system.

See:
          Description

Exception Summary
AuthException An exception representing an authorization violation.
ConfigurationException Exception representing a configuration error.
ImporterException Exception representing an error of the terminology import process
ImpossibleOperationException An exception representing an attempt to make an operation (e.g.: deletion/add) which is not possible.
InvalidProcessException Represents an attempts to make an operations for which no valid pre-conditions are found
ModelException Represents an inconsistency of the terminology model (e.g.: multiple fathers)
NonConformantRDFException Non Conform RDF The exception is risen when some expected RDF constructs are not present.
PropertyConstraintException Represents a validation constraints violation
RegistryAccessException Registry Manager Exception Thrown when an unauthorized operation is requested.
UnknownURIException Attempt to operate on an entity which is unknown to the system
WebSystemException Represent an issue of the admin web interface
WebWriterException An exception arising from the web rendering of resources.
 

Package net.metarelate.terminology.exceptions Description

Exception used in the system. Some exception e.g.: uk.gov.metoffice.terminology.exceptions.AuthException and uk.gov.metoffice.terminology.exceptions.RegistryManagerException can be seen in part as control elements. However, their use as such should be restricted in the command line (e.g.: command fails if authorization exception is risen) and not systematically within the system.
